'''Dangerous Cluster''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all opponents

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon''': Seems like these hilichurls are... initiating their newest members!?
:'''Paimon''': With there being so many of them, anyone passing by wouldn't stand a chance.
:'''Paimon''': We'd better do something about it – and fast.
{{Dialogue end}}

==Enemies==
===Version 1=== 
{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*2;Hilichurl Grenadier}}
* One of the following: {{Enemy List|Hydro Abyss Mage;Pyro Abyss Mage;Dendro Samachurl;Cryo Abyss Mage}}

===Version 2=== 
{{Enemy List|Hydro Samachurl;Hilichurl Fighter*3}}

==Trivia==
* In Wolvendom, the enemies may occasionally spawn inside the cliff side instead of on top.
